key.frycparry.key_parry: Parry (set it to Unbound to parry with Use Key)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.title: Sword Parry Config
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enableB: For modded items that are not swords, shovels, axes (etc), but are tools in code (ToolItem)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.disable: Disable block action after parrying axe attack
When turned on, axe attack will set cooldown whether it was parry or not
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enchant: Make enchantments for shield appear on swords and axes found in chests
This option doesn't do anything when blocking with axes and swords is disabled
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.enableB: 0 - player can block and parry with empty offhand;  1 - player can also block and parry when dual wields weapons; 2 - player can block and parry with any item in offhand;
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.parryKn: Reduce knockback strength for players by:
Example: when set to 3, and knockback strength of active item is 9, knockback strength for parried player will be 6 (9 - 3 = 6)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.weaknes: Reduce weakness duration for players by:
Example: when set to 30, and weakness duration of active item is 100, weakness duration for parried player will be 70 (100 - 30 = 70)
Reduce weakness amplifier for players by:
Example: when set to 1, and weakness amplifier of active item is 2, weakness amplifier for parried player will be 1 (2 - 1 = 1)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.slownes: Reduce slowness duration for players by:
Example: when set to -30, and slowness duration of active item is 100, slowness duration for parried player will be 130 (100 - (-30) = 130)
Reduce slowness amplifier for players by:
Example: when set to -1, and slowness amplifier of active item is 1, slowness amplifier for parried player will be 2 (1 - (-1) = 2)
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.cooldow: Cooldown after switching item, blocking attack or interrupting block action
Cooldown after switching item, blocking attack or interrupting block action
Cooldown after switching item, blocking attack or interrupting block action

text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.shieldP: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.axeParr: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.pickaxe: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.swordPa: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.shovelP: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.hoeParr: Example: when set to 10, the first 10 ticks of blocking with this item will count as parry
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.pickaxe: % of damage taken after blocking melee attack
Example: when set to 15, player will take 15% of the original damage after blocking melee attack
text.autoconfig.frycparry.option.axeBloc: % of damage taken after blocking melee attack
Example: when set to 15, player will take 15% of the original damage after blocking melee attack

Example: when set to 90, player will take 90% of the original damage after blocking projectile
